metadata.description: This all-new, all-ages comic magazine will thrill kids and parents alike! Featuring 48 pages of brand-new comics by acclaimed cartoonists Robert Goodin (The Kurdles), Cathy Malkasian (Percy Gloom), and other surprises! Starring the Kurdles! Greta Grump! Howdy Pardner! Pacho Clokey! The best kids comic magazine since the demise of Nickelodeon magazine!
metadata.name: The Kurdles Adventure Magazine
